Entries.DialogueText: Hi... Everything okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi... Everything okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, tastes just like golden walnuts! This is great!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, tastes just like golden walnuts! This is great!

Entries.DialogueText: This is a precious egg... A baby! I'm glad you brought it to me, I'll keep it safe.
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a precious egg... A baby! I'm glad you brought it to me, I'll keep it safe.

Entries.DialogueText: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...

Entries.DialogueText: But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.

Entries.DialogueText: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.

Entries.DialogueText: Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Sorry... I'm shy today. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Sorry... I'm shy today.

Entries.DialogueText: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you met the others like you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you met the others like you?

Entries.DialogueText: I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...

Entries.DialogueText: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if there are other bird families out there? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if there are other bird families out there?

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?

Entries.DialogueText: ...I'm sad today. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I'm sad today.

Entries.DialogueText: You go on... have fun. Let me be sad. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.

Entries.DialogueText: When it rains, strange birds visit.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When it rains, strange birds visit.

Entries.DialogueText: I try to speak to them... but they fly away. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I try to speak to them... but they fly away.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess they don't want to be friends... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess they don't want to be friends...

Entries.DialogueText: The valley is peaceful when it rains.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The valley is peaceful when it rains.

Entries.DialogueText: To me... nature is someone I know, with different moods.
Entries.DisplayPattern: To me... nature is someone I know, with different moods.

Entries.DialogueText: It's ready!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's ready!

Entries.DialogueText: Haha! ...That was a great day! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha! ...That was a great day!

Entries.DialogueText: You know... I still miss my family back on the island... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know... I still miss my family back on the island...

Entries.DialogueText: But mostly, I feel happy about the memories, not sad.
Entries.DisplayPattern: But mostly, I feel happy about the memories, not sad.

Entries.DialogueText: ...and I really feel like I belong here! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and I really feel like I belong here!

Entries.DialogueText: It's a beautiful world, friends...
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a beautiful world, friends...

Entries.DialogueText: ...and I'm glad to be part of it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...and I'm glad to be part of it!

Entries.DialogueText: L... leave the island? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: L... leave the island?

Entries.DialogueText: O... other kids? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: O... other kids?

Entries.DialogueText: I... {Portrait:Unique}
I'll go...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll go...

Entries.DialogueText: But... my family... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... my family...

Entries.DialogueText: She says...
Entries.DisplayPattern: She says...

Entries.DialogueText: She says the parrots are all happy for me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: She says the parrots are all happy for me.

Entries.DialogueText: ...And that they want me to start the next chapter of life, wherever it may lead...
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...And that they want me to start the next chapter of life, wherever it may lead...

Entries.DialogueText: And no matter what happens... they'll always be my family... forever.
Entries.DisplayPattern: And no matter what happens... they'll always be my family... forever.

Entries.DialogueText: Goodbye!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Goodbye!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm ready! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm ready!

Entries.DialogueText: A new arrival to the valley...
Entries.DisplayPattern: A new arrival to the valley...

Entries.DialogueText: It seems our little town is growing!
Entries.DisplayPattern: It seems our little town is growing!

Entries.DialogueText: What are you doing, {Farmer_Name}?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What are you doing, ?

Entries.DialogueText: Waves... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Waves...

Entries.DialogueText: The other birds say the reason Leo can't fly... is because Leo spend too much time in the waves, long ago. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The other birds say the reason Leo can't fly... is because Leo spend too much time in the waves, long ago.

Entries.DialogueText: My wings full of water, now. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My wings full of water, now.

Entries.DialogueText: Fish? Easy... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fish? Easy...

Entries.DialogueText: If you want to say 'hi', you just have to ask.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you want to say 'hi', you just have to ask.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I don't understand that, yet. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I don't understand that, yet.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe when I become an elder, someday.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe when I become an elder, someday.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh.. Yeah. Leo ponders the big questions, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh.. Yeah. Leo ponders the big questions, too.

Entries.DialogueText: Like... 'will I find more walnuts on the beach, or in the volcano?'
Entries.DisplayPattern: Like... 'will I find more walnuts on the beach, or in the volcano?'

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*...Life complicated... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...Life complicated...

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? {Portrait:Sad}
Tell me about the place you come from... your home. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Tell me about the place you come from... your home.

Entries.DialogueText: People... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: People...

Entries.DialogueText: Sounds nice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sounds nice.

Entries.DialogueText: Cold? ...I don't understand... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Cold? ...I don't understand...

Entries.DialogueText: Farm? So, you're saying you grow your own walnuts? You don't have to hunt for them? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farm? So, you're saying you grow your own walnuts? You don't have to hunt for them?

Entries.DialogueText: ...Wow.. {Portrait:Unique}
I'm thinking... {Farmer_Name} is smart. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thinking... is smart.

Entries.DialogueText: Are... Are there... other kids? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are... Are there... other kids?

Entries.DialogueText: ...I know I'm not actually a bird, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I know I'm not actually a bird, ...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm like you. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm like you.

Entries.DialogueText: But I don't like thinking about it... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But I don't like thinking about it...

Entries.DialogueText: ...because I'm so alone. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...because I'm so alone.

Entries.DialogueText: With my bird family, I feel like I belong. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: With my bird family, I feel like I belong.

Entries.DialogueText: But... I don't belong. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... I don't belong.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I don't belong anywhere... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I don't belong anywhere...

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry...

Entries.DialogueText: It's hard to remember to talk... normally... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's hard to remember to talk... normally...

Entries.DialogueText: You think I'm weird, don't you? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You think I'm weird, don't you?

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for saying that.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for saying that.

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks, I've gotten used to you too! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks, I've gotten used to you too!

Entries.DialogueText: Hehe... You're getting pretty good at that! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hehe... You're getting pretty good at that!

Entries.DialogueText: Sometimes I wonder how different my life would be if I had never washed up on this island... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sometimes I wonder how different my life would be if I had never washed up on this island...

Entries.DialogueText: Back home, I didn't really care about birds. I never thought to listen to what they might be saying. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Back home, I didn't really care about birds. I never thought to listen to what they might be saying.

Entries.DialogueText: Though I guess that's normal for... normal kids. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though I guess that's normal for... normal kids.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder what... normal kids would have to say about me... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder what... normal kids would have to say about me...

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think I could ever be a normal kid again? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think I could ever be a normal kid again?

Entries.DialogueText: Yes
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yes

Entries.DialogueText: No
Entries.DisplayPattern: No

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe...

Entries.DialogueText: Hmmm... I guess you're right. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmmm... I guess you're right.

Entries.DialogueText: Though living on this island has given me a lot of experiences normal kids would never have. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Though living on this island has given me a lot of experiences normal kids would never have.

Entries.DialogueText: If it weren't for the parrots... who knows what would have happened to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If it weren't for the parrots... who knows what would have happened to me.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm happy I met them. I'll always consider them to be my family, even if that makes me a little strange. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm happy I met them. I'll always consider them to be my family, even if that makes me a little strange.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyways, thanks for talking to me, {Farmer_Name}.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyways, thanks for talking to me, .

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe some day, you can be a part of our family too, hehe. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe some day, you can be a part of our family too, hehe.

Entries.DialogueText: Here, let me teach you how to say \
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, let me teach you how to say \

Entries.DialogueText: Haha! I've never seen anything like this before... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Haha! I've never seen anything like this before...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm making friends with these birds! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm making friends with these birds!

Entries.DialogueText: Leo's unblinking eyes are glued to the screen. You're unable to get his attention.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leo's unblinking eyes are glued to the screen. You're unable to get his attention.

Entries.DialogueText: This is a maze inside of a maze... My head is spinning... {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is a maze inside of a maze... My head is spinning...

Entries.DialogueText: The idea of an egg hunt is a little bit weird... but I guess the eggs don't belong to any of my family members... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The idea of an egg hunt is a little bit weird... but I guess the eggs don't belong to any of my family members...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh well, I'll join in anyway! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh well, I'll join in anyway!

Entries.DialogueText: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colorful as back home! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The flowers here are nice, but they aren't as colorful as back home!

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance... {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I'll ever have to get up there and dance...

Entries.DialogueText: You need a partner to participate in the dance? Does a bird count? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You need a partner to participate in the dance? Does a bird count?

Entries.DialogueText: Shhh... I'm learning the secrets of the perfect roast.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shhh... I'm learning the secrets of the perfect roast.

Entries.DialogueText: My home is that way, across the ocean. It feels so close, but so far away. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My home is that way, across the ocean. It feels so close, but so far away.

Entries.DialogueText: I hope my friends are doing well. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hope my friends are doing well.

Entries.DialogueText: The moonlight jellies are my old friends... they come to the island every year, too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The moonlight jellies are my old friends... they come to the island every year, too.

Entries.DialogueText: My old friends from home are visiting us soon! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My old friends from home are visiting us soon!

Entries.DialogueText: Linus feels uncomfortable about joining in, so I'm going to keep him company.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Linus feels uncomfortable about joining in, so I'm going to keep him company.

Entries.DialogueText: We'll have our own little feast... mashed winter root and spice berry fish! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We'll have our own little feast... mashed winter root and spice berry fish!

Entries.DialogueText: I don't know what most of this stuff is... but it tastes good! {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know what most of this stuff is... but it tastes good!

Entries.DialogueText: You could make an igloo twice as warm if you stuffed feathers in the walls!
Entries.DisplayPattern: You could make an igloo twice as warm if you stuffed feathers in the walls!

Entries.DialogueText: *crunch* *crunch* Snow makes a funny noise when you step on it! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *crunch* *crunch* Snow makes a funny noise when you step on it!

Entries.DialogueText: I love this. I'm going to put it in my nest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I love this. I'm going to put it in my nest.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you sure? This is so nice...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you sure? This is so nice...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh... I don't know if I can digest this...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh... I don't know if I can digest this...

Entries.DialogueText: *sniff* *sniff*... Why are you giving this to me? Do you want me to bury it for you?
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sniff* *sniff*... Why are you giving this to me? Do you want me to bury it for you?

Entries.DialogueText: I accept your gift.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I accept your gift.

Entries.DialogueText: It seems like you're going to live. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It seems like you're going to live.

Entries.DialogueText: My bird-friends spotted you and told me you were in danger, so I dragged you all the way down here. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My bird-friends spotted you and told me you were in danger, so I dragged you all the way down here.

Entries.DialogueText: Please be safe out there. I don't want to be sad anymore... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Please be safe out there. I don't want to be sad anymore...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm excited to see this one... I want to learn everything about the world!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm excited to see this one... I want to learn everything about the world!

Entries.DialogueText: Leo is glued to the screen!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leo is glued to the screen!

Entries.DialogueText: Did you see that? They showed the fern islands... that's where I'm from! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did you see that? They showed the fern islands... that's where I'm from!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm really happy to be here. This is all so interesting!
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm really happy to be here. This is all so interesting!

Entries.DialogueText: Leo seems very interested in the movie.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Leo seems very interested in the movie.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... it was like magic!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... it was like magic!

Entries.DialogueText: I like this place. The weather reminds me of home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I like this place. The weather reminds me of home.

Entries.DialogueText: Can I have some eggs? I want to put them in my nest.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Can I have some eggs? I want to put them in my nest.
